obfuscation: ﻿y foremost actual contact with the English language was in third grade in compulsory school .
original: ﻿y first actual contact with the English language was in third grade in compulsory school.

obfuscation: I remember I was actually looking forward to it .
original: I remember I was really looking forward to it.

obfuscation: I was going to determine how to speak and read in a foreign language .
original: I was going to learn how to speak and read in a foreign language.

obfuscation: It felt like it made me turn up a little bit !
original: It felt like it made me grow up a little bit!

obfuscation: I do n't remember how many English lessons we had a week at that time but I remember that a teacher came to our small school only for those occasions .
original: I don't remember how many English lessons we had a week at that time but I remember that a teacher came to our little school only for those occasions.

obfuscation: I suppose my ordinary teacher was n't certificated for it or just did n't want to teach English .
original: I suppose my ordinary teacher wasn't certificated for it or simply didn't want to teach English.

obfuscation: Well , I wished learning some English words and I liked the English lessons for the rest of compulsory school as well .
original: Well, I liked learning some English words and I liked the English lessons for the rest of compulsory school as well.

obfuscation: And it was pretty cool to be able to speak some when being abroad , in Greece for example .
original: And it was pretty cool to be able to speak some when being abroad, in Greece for example.

obfuscation: At senior high school though , I made of some reason lose my interest for English .
original: At senior high school though, I did of some reason lose my interest for English.

obfuscation: I found it like everyone in my class was doing much better than me .
original: I felt it like everyone in my class was doing much better than me.

obfuscation: Many of my friends had been to England or the United States taking language courses during some weeks in the summer .
original: Many of my friends had been to England or the United States taking language courses during some weeks in the summer.

obfuscation: nowadays when looking back at that time I do n't think I actually was much worse than the others , perhaps instead bad self-confidence was the reason why I was n't so active on the English lessons .
original: Now when looking back at that time I don't think I actually was much worse than the others, perhaps instead bad self-confidence was the reason why I wasn't so active on the English lessons.

obfuscation: Of course I did make the exercises in the books , read what we were supposed to read and answer the questions I got .
original: Of course I did do the exercises in the books, read what we were supposed to read and answer the questions I got.

obfuscation: But I did n't throw myself into discussions though , and speeches in front of the class were n't exactly 'my cup of tea ' .
original: But I didn't throw myself into discussions though, and speeches in front of the class weren't exactly 'my cup of tea'.

obfuscation: One year after senior high school , I got to know about a one semester English class in Portslade near Brighton in Great Britain .
original: One year after senior high school, I got to know about a one semester English course in Portslade near Brighton in Great Britain.

obfuscation: It is a course you apply for through Visings Folk High School in Sweden .
original: It is a course you apply for through Visings Folk High School in Sweden.

obfuscation: There are only Swedish students on the path but all teachers and staffs are Englishmen/women .
original: There are only Swedish students on the course but all teachers and staffs are Englishmen/women.

obfuscation: And your accommodation during the course is with an English class .
original: And your accommodation during the course is with an English family.

obfuscation: I went there hoping to improve my English and also to become a glimpse of British society and culture .
original: I went there hoping to improve my English and also to get a glimpse of British society and culture.

obfuscation: This was accordingly the inaugural time I was really forced to speak English .
original: This was accordingly the first time I was really forced to speak English.

obfuscation: I was surprised how comfortable it was to get into the language .
original: I was surprised how easy it was to get into the language.

obfuscation: I surely made lots of grammatically mistakes but that was n't so important at that moment .
original: I surely did lots of grammatically mistakes but that wasn't so important at that moment.

obfuscation: The independent thing was that I actually dared to speak and put my trust in that people understood me .
original: The main thing was that I actually dared to speak and put my trust in that people understood me.

obfuscation: I think the better way of learning a language , is to stay in a country where that language is spoken , for a while .
original: I think the best way of learning a language, is to stay in a country where that language is spoken, for a while.

obfuscation: Of course we studied grammar , wrote essays and so on the path , but I think I learn most just by listening , speaking and constantly being `` surrounded by English '' , written and spoken .
original: Of course we studied grammar, wrote essays and so on the course, but I think I learn most just by listening, speaking and constantly being "surrounded by English", written and spoken.

obfuscation: Now , when going to study English again ( and this time on a more advanced degree ) , I feel a bit unused to it because I have n't practised it for a while .
original: Now, when going to study English again (and this time on a more advanced level), I feel a bit unused to it because I haven't practised it for a while.

obfuscation: But I think , or at least hope , it will be quite comfortable to get into it again , at least the listening part .
original: But I think, or at least hope, it will be quite easy to get into it again, at least the listening part.

obfuscation: I remember that is the easiest thing , unless the speaker has got some , for me unknown , dialect or anything .
original: I think that is the easiest thing, unless the speaker has got some, for me unknown, dialect or anything.

obfuscation: When it comes to reading I think it depends very much of what you are reading , whether it is unmanageable or not .
original: When it comes to reading I think it depends very much of what you are reading, whether it is difficult or not.

obfuscation: When reading an English-written novel , I may not understand exactly all of the words , but I can get the floor on the whole anyway .
original: When reading an English-written novel, I may not understand exactly all of the words, but I can get the story on the whole anyway.

obfuscation: If reading specialist literature , though , it might be a bit more difficult , due to the fact that there may be lots of words that I normally make n't get into contact with .
original: If reading specialist literature, though, it might be a bit more difficult, due to the fact that there may be lots of words that I normally don't get into contact with.

obfuscation: According to speaking , as I mentioned before , I think it 's a question of self-reliance for me .
original: According to speaking, as I mentioned before, I think it's a question of self-reliance for me.

obfuscation: When I was in England I think I improved my speaking ability a lot , at least to use the language in casual speech .
original: When I was in England I think I improved my speaking ability a lot, at least to use the language in everyday speech.

obfuscation: I hope I will get into the language like that again now and also enlarge my vocabulary ( in writing as well , of course ) .
original: I hope I will get into the language like that again now and also enlarge my vocabulary (in writing as well, of course).

obfuscation: What I also would like to develop more is my pronunciation .
original: What I also would like to develop more is my pronunciation.

obfuscation: At this moment I think there is sometimes besides much a mix of Swedish- , American- , and British English in my language .
original: At this moment I think there is sometimes too much a mix of Swedish-, American-, and British English in my language.

obfuscation: My ambition is to get a consistently British pronunciation and fluency in my speaking .
original: My dream is to get a consistently British pronunciation and fluency in my speaking.

obfuscation: ( I think I have a retentive way to get there , though ! )
original: (I think I have a long way to get there, though!)

obfuscation: Concerning myself , I think , writing in English is the about difficult part .
original: Concerning myself, I think, writing in English is the most difficult part.

obfuscation: Maybe not spelling words right , but handling with the grammar right , knowing what expression or word burst where , and getting a clear structure in my composition , are , among other , things that I have to practise more .
original: Maybe not spelling words right, but handling with the grammar right, knowing what expression or word fit where, and getting a clear structure in my composition, are, among other, things that I have to practise more.

obfuscation: That 's common for all of the four skills that I 've noted - I have to practise a lot !
original: That's common for all of the four skills that I've mentioned - I have to practise a lot!
